segments.text: I can’t believe how careless the woman is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring everywhere, and she’s just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn’t even react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are about to cause an even bigger mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m furious that no one is taking responsibility here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just encouraging him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is so frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should be paying more attention to her surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
